name: Intro-to-bci
body:
### This is a blog. Or is it?
These things are always hard to say.

### This is not the only post.
At least, I don't think so, but I don't yet know how to add more.

This is a page where I'd ideally host:
* Drafts for NeurotechEDU tutorials/courseware
* Things I want people to look at
* Things which the invisible hand of history compels me to write

So let's get on with it and publish this Hello World post already.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
